name: Star Wars Open Worlds
description:
A LONG TIME AGO IN A GALAXY FAR, FAR AWAY...

We are uprooted from our home and thrown into this galaxy far, far away for the first time, experiencing it from an outsider's perspective. Abducted by slavers and recovering from the initial shock we are left with no choice but to join a small crew planning an escape from captivity, all the while the rising tide of the newly founded galactic empire sweeps across the galaxy! 

Embark on an engaging choice-driven story which will take you across different planets in the Star Wars universe during the very early years of the galactic empire and their push for supremacy. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Explore:

There will be 12 planets to openly explore, all with their own breathtakingly unique environments, stories, and characters.

Choose Your Path:

The player will be able to choose from 4 different paths; Darkside, Lightside, Gray, and Sandbox. The path you choose will will influence the direction of the story, the conclusion, and which companions are available to you.

Create Your Character:

The player will be able to design their character at the start of the game using an in-depth customization system. Choose your species, name, and various facial features to create a character unique to you. Because this is an RPG game, the player will also be able to choose various skills to upgrade and unlock as they progress. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:
  • An Engaging Choice-Driven Story.
  • 12 Planets to Explore
  • Fully Voice-Acted Characters
  • Character Customization
  • An RPG-Style Skill System
  • A New Crafting System
  • Vast Arrays of Weapons
  • Multiple Factions
  • New Companions
  • Bounty Hunting
  • Side Quests
...and lots more!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project is still in active development and there is not currently a playable build for others at the moment. The download link below will take you to our discord page. Eventually it will be updated to be a build download link.
